member.name: T:UnityEngine.WheelCollider
member.summary: A special collider for vehicle wheels.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.WheelHit
member.summary: Contact information for the wheel, reported by WheelCollider.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.WheelHit.collider
member.summary: The other Collider the wheel is hitting.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.WheelCollider.center
member.summary: The center of the wheel, measured in the object's local space.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.WheelHit.point
member.summary: The point of contact between the wheel and the ground.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.WheelCollider.radius
member.summary: The radius of the wheel, measured in local space.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.WheelHit.normal
member.summary: The normal at the point of contact.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.WheelHit.forwardDir
member.summary: The direction the wheel is pointing in.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.WheelCollider.suspensionDistance
member.summary: Maximum extension distance of wheel suspension, measured in local space.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.WheelHit.sidewaysDir
member.summary: The sideways direction of the wheel.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.WheelCollider.suspensionSpring
member.summary: The parameters of wheel's suspension. The suspension attempts to reach a target position by applying a linear force and a damping force.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.WheelHit.force
member.summary: The magnitude of the force being applied for the contact.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.WheelHit.forwardSlip
member.summary: Tire slip in the rolling direction. Acceleration slip is negative, braking slip is positive.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.WheelCollider.forceAppPointDistance
member.summary: Application point of the suspension and tire forces measured from the base of the resting wheel.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.WheelCollider.mass
member.summary: The mass of the wheel, expressed in kilograms. Must be larger than zero. Typical values would be in range (20,80).

member.name: P:UnityEngine.WheelCollider.wheelDampingRate
member.summary: The damping rate of the wheel. Must be larger than zero.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.WheelCollider.forwardFriction
member.summary: Properties of tire friction in the direction the wheel is pointing in.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.WheelHit.sidewaysSlip
member.summary: Tire slip in the sideways direction.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.WheelCollider.sidewaysFriction
member.summary: Properties of tire friction in the sideways direction.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.WheelCollider.motorTorque
member.summary: Motor torque on the wheel axle expressed in Newton metres. Positive or negative depending on direction.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.WheelCollider.brakeTorque
member.summary: Brake torque expressed in Newton metres.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.WheelCollider.steerAngle
member.summary: Steering angle in degrees, always around the local y-axis.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.WheelCollider.isGrounded
member.summary: Indicates whether the wheel currently collides with something (Read Only).

member.name: P:UnityEngine.WheelCollider.sprungMass
member.summary: The mass supported by this WheelCollider.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.WheelCollider.rpm
member.summary: Current wheel axle rotation speed, in rotations per minute (Read Only).

member.name: M:UnityEngine.WheelCollider.ConfigureVehicleSubsteps(System.Single,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Configure vehicle sub-stepping parameters.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.WheelCollider.GetGroundHit(UnityEngine.WheelHit&)
member.summary: Gets ground collision data for the wheel.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.WheelCollider.GetWorldPose(UnityEngine.Vector3&,UnityEngine.Quaternion&)
member.summary: Gets the world space pose of the wheel accounting for ground contact, suspension limits, steer angle, and rotation angle (angles in degrees).
